name: INCEPTION (BranBrando)
description:
Move: When character is selected (green), press w,a,s,d to move.

Archer: When selected, press space to aim(turns red). While aiming, press w,a,s,d to shoot in different direction. Can't block.

Knight:  When selected, press left shift to block. Press space to attack. Attack can destroy any enemies or items around(up, down, left, right).
